seo.title: Dishwashing Net, Dishwashing Sponge and Multipurpose Scrubber | Yik Seng Malaysia
seo.description: Durable and non-scratch dishwashing nets and multipurpose scrubbers, available with or without sponge. Gentle on glassware, tough on grease. Trusted in Malaysia for over 20 years.

hero.copy: Yik Seng Houseware Trading designs durable and non-scratch dishwashing nets and multipurpose scrubbers, available with or without sponge. Trusted in Malaysia for over 20 years, they are gentle on glassware, effective on grease, and compatible with any dish soap.

why.heading: Why use Yik Seng's CLEANING NET?
items: Non-scratch cleaning for plates, bowls, glassware, and cookware
Works with any dish detergent; rinses and dries quickly
Available with or without sponge for different cleaning needs
Long-lasting, odor-resistant netting for everyday use

yellow-net.alt: Yellow dishwashing net non scratch scrubber with sponge

green-net.alt: Green dishwashing net multipurpose kitchen scrubber without sponge
